text: Indeed, Allah does not burden a soul beyond what it can bear.
Verily, with hardship comes ease.
So remember Me; I will remember you.
The best among you are those who learn the Qur'an and teach it.
The strong believer is better and more beloved to Allah than the weak believer.
Allah loves those who are patient.
Whoever guides to something good has a reward similar to that of its doer.
And verify your relatives' needs, and spend out of what We have provided for you.
He who is not merciful to others will not be treated mercifully.
Indeed, in the remembrance of Allah do hearts find rest.
Make things easy for people and do not make them difficult.
The best deed is that which is done regularly, even if little.
الدين النصيحة (Religion is sincere advice).
Your smile for your brother is charity.
And worship your Lord until there comes to you the certainty.
Paradise lies at the feet of your mother.
Whoever does not show mercy will not be shown mercy.
Indeed, Allah is with those who fear Him and those who are doers of good.
Beware of suspicion, for suspicion is the worst of false tales.
The best charity is that given in Ramadan.
Allah is closer to you than your jugular vein.
A good word is charity.
Indeed, Allah loves the doers of good.
Actions are judged by intentions.
Whoever treads a path seeking knowledge, Allah will ease his path to Paradise.
And speak to people good [words].
Allah does not look at your forms or your wealth, but He looks at your hearts and your deeds.
Verily, Allah enjoins justice and the doing of good.
The best of you are those who are best in character.
So whoever does an atom's weight of good will see it.
Kindness is a mark of faith.
Every act of kindness is charity.
Indeed, patience is from faith.
Allah guides whom He wills.
He who believes in Allah and the Last Day should speak good or remain silent.
And spend [in the way of Allah] out of what We have provided you before death approaches one of you.
The believer is not bitten from the same hole twice.
Indeed, the best of provision is piety.
And what is with you will vanish, but what is with Allah will remain.
Shall I not tell you about the best of deeds?
He who removes a worldly grief from a believer, Allah will remove from him one of the griefs of the Day of Judgment.
Indeed, in the creation of the heavens and the earth and the alternation of night and day are signs for those of understanding.
The best richness is the richness of the soul.
And whoever relies upon Allah – then He is sufficient for him.
Goodness is a proof of faith.
Do not withhold your money, for if you withhold it, Allah will withhold His mercy from you.
Indeed, Allah loves those who repent and loves those who purify themselves.
He who loves for Allah's sake and hates for Allah's sake is a true believer.
Say, 'He is Allah, [who is] One.'
The world is a prison for the believer and a paradise for the disbeliever.
And whoever does righteous deeds, whether male or female, while being a believer – those will enter Paradise.
The best of you are those who feed others and greet those whom they know and those whom they do not know.
Indeed, Allah commands you to return trusts to their owners.
Purity is half of faith.
And cooperate in righteousness and piety.
A believer to another believer is like a building whose different parts support each other.
Indeed, Allah withholds and gives abundance.
None of you truly believes until he loves for his brother what he loves for himself.
O mankind, fear your Lord.
The best of people are those most beneficial to people.
Indeed, He is Knowing and Forbearing.
Modesty brings nothing but goodness.
And establish prayer and give zakah and obey the Messenger.
The greatest jihad is to speak the truth in the face of oppression.
Indeed, Allah loves those who are pure.
The best remembrance is saying: 'La ilaha illallah'.
And say, 'My Lord, increase me in knowledge.'
When a man dies, his deeds come to an end except for three...
Indeed, He created you in pairs.
The seeking of knowledge is obligatory upon every Muslim.
And whoever fears Allah – He will make for him a way out.
The best of companions is the one who is best to his family.
Indeed, Allah is the Light of the heavens and the earth.
A smile is charity.
And We have not sent you except as a mercy to the worlds.
He is not of us who does not have mercy on young children.
Indeed, all souls will taste death.
The one who forgives and seeks reconciliation, Allah will reward him.
And if you are grateful, I will surely increase you [in favor].
Whoever shows you your faults, he is your benefactor.
Indeed, only those believe who, when Allah is mentioned, their hearts become fearful.
Remove harmful things from the road; it is an act of charity.
And We have certainly created man in hardship.
Charity does not decrease wealth.
Indeed, Allah is Kind and Most Merciful.
Dispute not, lest you be wronged.
And strive for Allah with the striving due to Him.
The best form of repentance is to return to obedience.
Indeed, to Allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and earth.
None of you truly believes until his desires align with what I have brought.
And worship your Lord until there comes to you the Hour.
The world is the believer's prison and the disbeliever's paradise.
Indeed, the best of provision is piety.
Whoever pursues a path to knowledge, Allah will make easy his path to Paradise.
And say, 'My Lord, increase me in knowledge.'
Kindness to parents is a path to Paradise.
Indeed, Allah loves those who purify themselves.
He who loves to meet Allah, Allah loves to meet him.
And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy to remember.
The best among you are those who have the best manners.
